Fantasy in The Mirage is the nineteenth Story Collection in Arknights.

Contents

  • 1 Operations
  • 2 Stories
  • 3 Operators
  • 4 Headhunting
  • 5 "Sweetie"
    • 5.1 "A School For Item Spirits"
  • 6 Store
  • 7 Outfits
  • 8 Furniture
  • 9 Miscellanous
  • 10 Navigation

Stories[edit]

WARNING!

This section contains marked spoilers for content that is not yet released on the Global server.

Unofficial English translations provided by Shainel.
Each story can be unlocked in any order at the cost of 1 Information Fragment.
胡君
On her way back from Tianshi Bureau after her meditation, Lin Qingyan received a letter from Zuo Le, asking her to investigate the disappearance of his friend, Yun Qingping. However, she accidentally entered a mysterious town and was embroiled in another case of martial arts' secrets thievery.

蒲先生
Lin Qingyan saw a talking broom and walking scroll at Zhizhui Academy....and learned the truth from Mr. Pu. She also realized a bigger trouble is in works as more and more people compete for the secret book.

石头记
During a robbery investigation, Lin Qingyan found a stone that had belonged to a dying man for his entire life. The stone reminded him of his encounter with its collector.

白锦
Yun Qingping learns that whoever had "invited" him to Mangshan is waiting for him there. On his way up, he met a woman who implored him to rescue his lost lover who was trapped in a weiqi game. Later, he learns that the weiqi game is still ongoing for years, waiting for the one who can destroy it.

失剑客
A swordsman lost his sword in the town and encountered someone with similar objective. Lin Qingyan is pursuing this person who stole the secret book. However, a shocking development out of the blue made her realize the sword was never lost.

凌绝顶
The secret book sought by the martial artists was actually stolen by Huai Tianpei at the behest of a Shanhaizhong member named Mo Yi. She used the manual to conjure a gigantic phantasm of the first Sui fragment, Shuo. This resulted in a dramatic clash between the phantasm and Huai Tianpei.

小镇志
Hundred years ago, Sui awakened and destroyed the town of Mangshan. However, with destruction comes rebirth. With Yi's assistance, the owner of Jie's Garden, they worked together to rebuild the town. This is the origin of present-day Town of Mangshan.

Operators[edit]

  • The following Operators will gain 50% extra Trust (except from Annihilation):
  • The following Operators receive their second Operator Module:
    • Gavial the Invincible (CEN-Y)
    • Goldenglow (FUN-Y)
    • Typhon (SIE-Y)

Store[edit]

  • "Afternoon Teatime" is now available in the Distinctions Store and Universal Certificates Exchange Area.
  • The following pack is available in the Packs Store until July 18, 2025, which can only be purchased once per account:

Outfits[edit]

The following outfits are available in the Outfit Store until July 29, 2025:

New
Re-edition
Additional information: All the old outfits are available until July 22, 2025.

Furniture[edit]

The Dark Blue Lodge furniture theme is available in the Furniture Store until July 22, 2025.
